mdRecord.dcterms:title: Finger Tip Photos; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 34 (front of added page); "Criminals Nailed. Finger Tip Photos as a Means of Identification. From Our Own Correspondent."; Dr. Declere has a new technique for identification, which uses X-rays and chemicals to make images of finger bones and nails. The technique might be used for victims who drown.; no pub info; DF 654
